briefdescription.para: Code unit width 8 is used by default.
Main header file for JPCRE2 library to be included by programs that uses its functionalities.

detaileddescription.para: It includes the pcre2.h header, therefore you shouldn't include pcre2.h separately in your program. Make sure to link both jpcre2 and pcre2 library when compiling.

If you are using JPCRE2 with all of its source files, you won't need to link it with JPCRE2 library, but do remember that you still need to link with pcre2 library
Md Jahidul Hamid
